flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: The protrudingnhorn on its headnis very hard.fIt is used fornbashing throughnthick ice.
The protrudingnhorn on its headnis very hard.fIt is used fornbashing throughnthick ice.
Loves freezingncold conditions.nRelishes swimmingfin a frigid cli­nmate of around 14Fndegrees.
Although it can'tnwalk well on land,nit is a gracefulfswimmer. It espe­ncially loves beingnin frigid seas.
In daytime, it isnoften found asleepnon the seabed infshallow waters.nIts nostrils closenwhile it swims.
The light blue furnthat covers itnkeeps it protectedfagainst the cold.nIt loves iceberg-nfilled oceans.
SEEL hunts for prey in the frigid seanunderneath sheets of ice.nWhen it needs to breathe, it punchesfa hole through the ice with thensharply protruding section of its head.
SEEL hunts for prey in the frigid seanunderneath sheets of ice.nWhen it needs to breathe, it punchesfa hole through the ice with thensharply protruding section of its head.
SEEL hunt for prey in frigid, ice-coverednseas. When it needs to breathe, it punchesna hole through the ice with the sharplynprotruding section of its head.
Covered with light blue fur, its hide isnthick and tough. It is active in bitterncold of minus 40 degrees Fahrenheit.
The protruding horn on its head is verynhard. It is used for bashing through thicknicebergs.
A Pokémon that lives on icebergs.nIt swims in the sea using the pointnon its head to break up ice.
A Pokémon that lives on icebergs.nIt swims in the sea using the pointnon its head to break up ice.
A Pokémon that lives on icebergs.nIt swims in the sea using the pointnon its head to break up ice.
Although it can’t walk well on land,nit is a graceful swimmer. It especiallynloves being in frigid seas.
In daytime, it is often found asleepnon the seabed in shallow waters.nIts nostrils close while it swims.
Un habitant des icebergs.nEn mer, il utilise la corne surnsa tête pour briser la banquise.
A Pokémon that lives on icebergs.nIt swims in the sea using the pointnon its head to break up ice.
Un habitant des icebergs.nEn mer, il utilise la corne surnsa tête pour briser la banquise.
A Pokémon that lives on icebergs.nIt swims in the sea using the pointnon its head to break up ice.
The colder it gets, the better it feels.nIt joyfully swims around oceans so coldnthat they are filled with floating ice.
The colder it gets, the better it feels.nIt joyfully swims around oceans so coldnthat they are filled with floating ice.
ひょうざんで　くらす　ポケモン。nあたまの　とがった　でっぱりでnこおりを　わって　うみを　およぐ。
빙산에 사는 포켓몬이다.n머리의 뾰족하게 돌출된 부분으로n얼음을 깨고 바다를 헤엄친다.
Un habitant des icebergs. En mer, il utilise la cornensur sa tête pour briser la banquise.
Dieses Pokémon lebt auf Eisbergen. Es schwimmtnim Eiswasser und bricht das Eis mithilfe seines Horns.
Este Pokémon vive en icebergs. Nada en el mar y usanel cuerno de su cabeza para romper el hielo.
Pokémon che vive sugli iceberg. Nuota spaccandonil ghiaccio con la punta che ha sulla testa.
A Pokémon that lives on icebergs. It swims in thensea using the point on its head to break up ice.
氷山で　暮らす　ポケモン。n頭の　とがった　でっぱりでn氷を　割って　海を　泳ぐ。
みずいろの　たいもうに　おおわれたnひふは　ぶあつくて　じょうぶ。nれいか４０ど　でも　かつどうできる。
하늘색의 털로 뒤덮인n피부는 두껍고 튼튼하다.n영하 40도라도 활동할 수 있다.
Sa peau épaisse et dure est recouverte d’unenfourrure bleu clair. Elle permet à ce Pokémonnde résister aux températures les plus glaciales.
Unter seinem hellblauen Pelz liegt eine dicke undnfeste Haut. Es ist bei frostigen -40 °C noch aktiv.
Está recubierto de un pelaje de color azul, y tiene unanpiel gruesa y tosca. Se mantiene activo a -40 °C.
Sotto la pelliccia azzurra ha una pelle spessa e dura.nPuò resistere a una temperatura di -40 °C.
Covered with light blue fur, its hide is thick andntough. It is active in bitter cold ofn-40 degrees Fahrenheit.
水色の　体毛に　覆われた　皮膚はn分厚くて　丈夫。n零下４０度でも　活動できる。
こおりに　おおわれた　うみで　エサを　とる。nいきつぎを　するときは　あたまの　でっぱりでnこおりを　わって　うみから　かおを　だす。
얼음으로 뒤덮인 바다에서 먹이를 잡는다.n숨을 쉴 때는 머리의 돌출된 부분으로n얼음을 깨고 바다 밖으로 얼굴을 내민다.
Otaria chasse ses proies dans l’eau gelée, sous la couche denglace. Lorsqu’il cherche à respirer, il perce un trou en frappantnla glace avec la partie saillante de sa tête.
Jurob jagt unter der eisigen Oberfläche des Eismeeres nachnBeute. Zum Luftholen schlägt es mit dem vorstehenden Teilnseines Kopfes ein Loch ins Eis.
Seel busca a sus presas en aguas heladas, bajo las capas denhielo. Cuando necesita respirar, abre un agujerito en el hieloncon la afilada protuberancia que tiene encima de la cabeza.
Seel caccia le prede nel mare gelido sotto le lastrendi ghiaccio. Per respirare apre un foro nel ghiaccionusando la protuberanza appuntita sulla sommità del capo.
Seel hunts for prey in the frigid sea underneath sheets of ice.nWhen it needs to breathe, it punches a hole through the icenwith the sharply protruding section of its head.
氷に　覆われた　海で　エサを　採る。n息継ぎを　するときは　頭の　出っ張りでn氷を　割って　海から　顔を　出す。
こおりに　おおわれた　うみで　エサを　とる。nいきつぎを　するときは　あたまの　でっぱりでnこおりを　わって　うみから　かおを　だす。

Jurob jagt unter der frostigen Oberfläche des Eismeeresnnach Beute. Zum Luftholen schlägt es mit dem vorstehendennTeil seines Kopfes ein Loch ins Eis.
Seel busca a sus presas en aguas heladas, bajo las capas denhielo. Cuando necesita respirar, abre un agujerito en el hieloncon la afilada protuberancia que tiene encima de la cabeza.
Seel caccia le prede nel mare gelido sotto le lastrendi ghiaccio. Per respirare apre un foro nel ghiaccionusando la protuberanza appuntita sulla sommità del capo.
Seel hunts for prey in the frigid sea underneath sheets of ice.nWhen it needs to breathe, it punches a hole through the icenwith the sharply protruding section of its head.
氷に　覆われた　海で　エサを　採る。n息継ぎを　するときは　頭の　出っ張りでn氷を　割って　海から　顔を　出す。
つめたい　うみにしか　すまないとnかんがえられてきた。　アローラにnあらわれる　りゆうは　ナゾ。
차가운 바다에서만 산다고n추정되었다. 알로라에n나타나는 이유를 알 수 없다.
人們一向認為牠只棲息在n寒冷的海域，沒人知道牠n出現在阿羅拉的原因。
Tout le monde pensait qu’il ne pouvait survivrenque dans les mers froides.nPersonne ne sait donc ce qu’il fait à Alola.
Bisher wurde vermutet, dass es ausschließlichnin kalten Gewässern lebe. Warum es auch innAlola auftaucht, ist noch ein Rätsel.
Siempre se ha creído que solo puede subsistirnen aguas frías. El motivo de su aparición ennAlola es un misterio.
Finora si pensava che i Seel potessero viverensolo nei mari gelidi, pertanto la loro comparsanad Alola è alquanto misteriosa.
It has always been supposed that Seel live onlynin cold seas. Their having shown up in Alola isna mystery.
冷たい　海にしか　棲まないとn考えられてきた。　アローラにn現れる　理由は　ナゾ。
人们一直以为它只生活在寒冷的海域。n它出现在阿罗拉的原因是个谜。
ぶあつい　しぼうの　おかげで　さむいnうみも　へっちゃらだけど　あたたかいnうみでは　ちょっと　バテやすいのだ。
두꺼운 지방 덕분에n추운 바다는 문제없지만n따뜻한 바다에서 쉽게 지친다.
因為有著厚厚的脂肪，n所以完全不怕寒冷的海域，n但在溫暖的海裡就有點容易中暑。
Sa couche de gras lui permet d’être à l’aisendans les eaux les plus froides. Il a par contrenplus de mal à supporter les mers chaudes.
Kalte Meere machen ihm dank seiner dickennFettschicht nichts aus. Wärmere Gewässernsetzen ihm hingegen sehr zu.
La gruesa capa de grasa que le permite nadarnsin problemas en aguas frías le da más de unnsofoco en climas más cálidos.
Grazie al suo spesso strato di grasso nuotantranquillamente nell’acqua gelida. Nei marincaldi rischia facilmente lo sfinimento.
Thanks to its thick fat, cold seas don’t bother itnat all, but it gets tired pretty easily innwarm waters.
分厚い　脂肪の　おかげで　寒いn海も　へっちゃらだけど　暖かいn海では　ちょっと　バテやすいのだ。
因为有着厚厚的脂肪，n所以在寒冷的海里它也毫不在意，n但在温暖的海里却有点容易疲劳。
こおるほど　さむいところが　すき。nひょうてんか　１０ど　くらいでnきもちよく　およいでいる。
얼어붙을 정도로 추운 곳을 좋아한다.n영하 10도 정도의 물속에서n기분 좋게 헤엄친다.
喜歡滴水成冰的寒冷地方。n在零下10度的溫度裡n也能舒服自在地游泳。
Il est à l’aise dans les endroits gelés.nIl nage avec plaisir dans de l’eau à -10 ºC.
Es bevorzugt eiskalte Lebensräume undnschwimmt mit Vorliebe in -10 ºC kaltem Wasser.
Le encantan los lugares gélidos y disfrutannadando en aguas a temperaturas en torno anlos -10 °C.
Adora gli ambienti gelidi. Nuota con piacerennell’acqua a temperature di circa -10 ºC.
Loves freezing-cold conditions.nRelishes swimming in a frigid climatenof around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.
凍るほど　寒いところが　好き。n氷点下　１０度　くらいでn気持ちよく　泳いでいる。
喜欢天寒地冻的地方，n就算零下10度n也能愉快地游泳。
